span.style: font-size:18; font-family:Comic Sans MS; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#550000
font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 n. 揣测的结果： a conclusion deduced by surmise or guesswork
【例】 That was only a conjecture, not a fact. 那只是猜测而非事实
【近】 speculation[,spekjʊ'leɪʃn], supposition, surmise, theory
【反】 fact 事实；axiom 公理
【考法 2】 v. 猜测，估计（大小、数量等）： to decide the size, amount, number, or distance of (something) without actual measurement
【近】 calculate, estimate, guess, gauge[geɪdʒ]
【反】 prove 证明
【考法 3】 v. （没有依据地）认为： to form an opinion from little or no evidence
【例】 conjecture that this disease is caused by a defective gene 揣测这种疾病是由基因缺陷导致的
【近】 assume, imagine, presume[prɪ'zjuːm], speculate, suppose
